title: Attend CHI 2025
summary: We attended CHI 2025 at Yokohama, Japan and presented two papers!
content: We attended CHI 2025 at Yokohama, Japan! Two papers were presented."Augmenting Tablet Typing Experience by Integrating Key-Press Finger Contact Types as Input" and "AirThumb: Supporting Mid-air Thumb Gestures with Built-in Sensors on Commodity Smartphones". Please check our project pages for more details!

title: Paper Acceptance
summary: Two papers were accepted by CHI 2025 LBW! Congrats to Yantao and Tianrui!
content: Two papers were accepted by CHI 2025 LBW! Congrats to Yantao and Tianrui!

title: Visit Shenzhen University
summary: We Visit VCC Lab at Shenzhen University!
content: We Visit VCC Lab at Shenzhen University!

title: New Research Grant Awarded
summary: We got a grant from @Natural Science Foundation of Guangdong Province - General Fund with 100,000 RMB!
content: We got a grant from @Natural Science Foundation of Guangdong Province - General Fund with 100,000 RMB!
Project Title: Low-Tethered Gesture-Based Interaction Techniques for Mobile VR Device

title: Welcoming New Master's Student
summary: Weirong Luo and Xiyun Luo join us as master students. Welcomes!
content: Weirong Luo and Xiyun Luo join us as master students. Welcomes!

title: New Research Grant Awarded
summary: We got a grant from @Natural Science Foundation of China - Young Scientists Fund with 300,000 RMB!
content: We got a grant from @Natural Science Foundation of China - Young Scientists Fund with 300,000 RMB!
Project Title: Ring-Based Interaction Techniques Through Electric-Field Sensing

title: Visit Monash University
summary: Dr. Taizhou Chen Visit Monash University! He gave talks at Sensi Lab, Embodied Visualisation Group, and Exertion Games Lab!
content: Dr. Taizhou Chen Visit Monash University! He gave talks at Sensi Lab, Embodied Visualisation Group, and Exertion Games Lab!
